versos: (fellows) Hebrews 10:33 - "Sometimes you were publicly exposed to insult and persecution; at other times you stood side by side with those who were so treated.";;;

(hence) Isaiah 56:12 - Come, they say, let me get wine Let us drink our fill of beer And tomorrow will be like today, or even far better.";;;

(digged) Genesis 26:25 - And he builded an altar there
